name: Project IOTA
description:
Hello! Just want to share this game internship project (1 out of 2 intern games) I made with a small group of aspiring game developers in the past (in 2022). This is also my first completed Unity game project. 

Project IOTA is a first-person puzzle game, which mostly focuses on exploring the base and reading datapads to find clues, but you will also get chased by holographic ghost-like enemies. The goal is to complete all the tasks and destroy all of your enemies.

From Which Company:

MoonRift

My Contributions:

  • Programming in C#
  • Enemy NPCs AI codes
  • Health and stamina system codes
  • Player’s basic control, mini games, and interactables (buttons and items) codes
  • Interior spaceship map model design
  • 3D models (beds, cryopods, computers, ship, map, etc.)
  • Material shading
  • Introduction cutscene animation
  • Fire, fog, and smoke particle effects

Game Engine:

Unity
